 2002-02692002-02-280,  ,  EC,  HEALTH,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the OZONE-DEPLETING SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 1998 by eliminating the exemption that allowed CFCs to be used in human and animal health care products, and by establishing a schedule to phase-out the use of CFCs in metered-dose inhalers by January 1, 2005.
